snippet: A gathering at City Hall celebrated a magazine that translated the feminist movement into print and that has survived far longer than some male commentators predicted.
abstract: A gathering at City Hall celebrated a magazine that translated the feminist movement into print and that has survived far longer than some male commentators predicted.

headline.main: After 40 Years, It's Still Ms. To Readers
headline.print_headline: After 40 Years, It’s Still Ms. To Readers
